segments.text: The water is cascading from the sink, a relentless stream falling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a little disgusted by the growing mess around the womanâ€™s feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's odd how she is so focused on the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she realize the danger she's in?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the children behind her, plotting their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy reaches into the jar with determination, while the girl waits patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It all feels like a ticking time bomb, ready to explode at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
